Name:
Jurua
HMS Handy
Fate:
Purchased by the United Kingdom, 5 September 1939
Sunk by U-432, 11 March 1943
Displacement:
1,350 long tons (1,370 t) (standard)
1,883 long tons (1,913 t) (deep load)
Propulsion:
2 shafts
Parsons geared steam turbines
3 Admiralty water-tube boilers
Range: 5,530 nmi (10,240 km; 6,360 mi) at 15 knots (28 km/h; 17 mph)
Armament:
3 × 1 - QF 4.7-inch (120 mm) Mk IX guns
2 × 4 - .50 cal machine guns
2 × 4 - 21 inch (533 mm) torpedo tubes
110 × depth charges, 3 rails and 8 throwers
